name: The Royal Game of Ur
description:
I watched a video (link below) from The British Museum and Tom Scott, and thought it looked like a ton of fun. Playing board games right now is a little tough, so I put a playable version together in Figma. You'll need 4d4 each, and a Figma account.

Have fun!

youtube.com/watch?v=WZskjLq040I
